personal.text: Compliance of the website, application, and company activities with GDPR requirements (EU), the United Kingdom, and the United States
list: Website compliance (Privacy Policy, Terms of Use, Cookie Policy)

Personal data audit (categories, contractors, processing types, subprocessors)
Privacy risk assessment for new products and services (DPIA, LIA, PIA)
Marketing of products and services without violating international privacy requirements
Information security. Technical and organizational data protection measures
Legalization of personal data processing (proportionality and necessity of legitimate interest, contract performance, validity of data subject consent, other grounds)
Data breach: how to act and who to inform
Response to requests from individuals and regulatory authorities
Representation and protection of interests in disputes and courts

list.title: Client Interests – Our Priority
list.text: Our goal is to find the 'right' legislative provisions based on your needs and the specifics of your business.

list.title: Confidentiality
list.text: Attorney-client privilege protects information entrusted by the Client. Our lawyers ensure full confidentiality of the cases they work on.

list.title: Clear and Concise Action Plan
list.text: Your task is to grow the business, plan, and our task is to reliably protect it and help bring your boldest ideas to life.

list.title: ONLINE Accessibility
list.text: High-quality legal services online, available for order anytime, anywhere, and from any device.

list.title: Openness to Innovation
list.text: From you – ideas; from us – unique ways to bring them to life and assess potential legal risks.

list.title: Cost Predictability
list.text: We pre-assess the scope of the task and inform you of the service cost and timeline. Transparency and predictability are the foundation of our Clients' trust.

list.title: Quality
list.text: All our lawyers have over 10 years of experience and hold numerous internationally recognized certificates. We provide high-quality, professional legal services personally and never involve students or interns.

list.title: We Solve Problems, Not Create Them
list.text: Our goal is to find 'how it is allowed to do' and offer all possible ways to bring your boldest plans to life, rather than saying 'how it is prohibited.'

list.title: Individual Approach
list.text: Cases may be similar but never identical. We believe our advice goes beyond legal knowledge. We take an interest in understanding the Client's business processes to offer the most optimal business solution.
